DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to measure the aberrations, corneal surface topography and pachymetry of normal human eyes with the NGDI.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Evaluation of the Next Generation Diagnostic Instrument (NGDI)
DOC.criteria: +10.00D to 20.00D of absolute spherical ametropia Must be part of the Bausch & Lomb research clinic Snellen visual acuity must be correctable to 20/25 No more than 6.00D of refractive astigmatism
